title.rendered: Fall Sports Registration and Tryout Information

content.rendered:
The high school sports season will begin on Monday, August 21 and registration for varsity and JV teams will open Monday, July 25.  Modified sports begin August 28.  Registration is done online through FamilyID.

Student-athlete physicals will be provided on Friday, August 18th from 7:45 -10:00 a.m at the Saratoga Springs High School Nurse’s Office.  Please use the sign-up form to schedule an appointment.  Please arrive 15 minutes prior to your time. 

Please see the tryout information for fall sports teams below.  For specific team information, please contact coaches directly.  Click here for coach contact information.

BOYS SOCCER

Varsity:  Monday 8/21-Wednesday 8/23 at the HS turf field, 7:00-9:00am

JV:  Monday 8/21-Wednesday 8/23 at the HS, grass field next to turf, 9:00-11:00am

Modified 9:  Monday 8/28-Wednesday 8/30 at Maple Ave front field, 9:00-11:00am

Modified 8:  Monday 8/28-Wednesday 8/30 at Maple Ave front field, 9:00-11:00am  (open to 7th and 8th graders)

BOYS GOLF

8/21 & 8/22: Varsity and JV Tryouts (9 holes) at Spa State Park…tee times start at 6:00 a.m. (Varsity candidates and upperclassmen will lead, with JVs and underclassmen to follow)

8/23: Top 12-16 Varsity Candidates will play 9 holes at McGregor, while remaining JV candidates will plan an additional 9 holes at the Spa State Park.

BOYS VOLLEYBALL

Varsity & JV: Monday, August 21st through Friday, August 25th 10:30 – 12:30

BOYS XC

Varsity, JV & Freshman:  Monday, 8/21 at 8:30am at Pitney Farm.  No cuts.

Modified:  Monday, 8/28 at 8:30am at Pitney Farm.  No cuts.

CHEER

Tryout dates: 8/28 – 4:00-6:00pm  and 8/29-9/1 – 4:30-6:30 pm

FIELD HOCKEY

Varsity & JV:  Mon. Aug. 21st JV/Varsity 8:30–11:30am/Varsity Candidates only 6:15–7:45 pm also

  • Tues. Aug. 22nd JV/Varsity 8 – 11am Timed Mile Run/Varsity Candidates only 6:15–7:45 pm also
  • Wed. Aug. 23rd JV/Varsity 8:30–11:30am/Varsity Candidates only 6:15–7:45 pm also
  • Thur. Aug 24th   JV/Varsity 8:30–11:30am/Varsity Candidates only 6:15–7:45 pm also
  • Fri.   Aug. 25th   JV/Varsity 8:30–11:30am
  • Sat.  Aug 26th    JV/Varsity 8–11am

Modified 7th & 8th grade:  Aug 28th 8:00 – 10:00, at Maple Ave. School, Tryouts go on for several days.

FOOTBALL

Varsity: Sr. & Jr. athletes that complete our 2-week preseason will be on the team.

  • Underclassman attempting to play Varsity will be given the 1st week to determine if they made the team.

Junior Varsity: Sophomore athletes who complete out 2-week preseason will be on the team.

  • Underclassman attempting to play JV will be given the 1st week to determine if they made the team.

Freshman:  Freshman athletes who complete our 2-week preseason will be on the team.

  • Underclassman attempting to play Freshman will be given the 1st week to determine if they made the team.

8th Grade Modified:  All athletes make the team.

7th Grade Modified:  All athletes make the team.

GIRLS GOLF

  • Monday, August 21st 7:00am – pre-mtg before tee-off – Par 29 Golf Course
  • Tuesday, August 22nd 7:15am – Par 29 Golf Course
  • Wednesday, August 23rd 7:30 – McGregor Golf Course

GIRLS SOCCER

Varsity and JV Teams are open to 8th – 12th graders.  High School Varsity Field:

  • Monday, August 21, 2023: 8:30am-11:00am & 2:00pm-3:30pm
  • Tuesday, August 22, 2023: 8:30-11:00am & 2:00pm-3:30pm
  • Wednesday, August 23, 2023: 8:30-11:00 & 1:00pm-2:30pm
  • Thursday, August 24, 2023: 8:30am-11:00am & 1:00pm-2:30pm
  • Friday, August 25, 2023: 8:30am-11:00am
Modified 9: Monday 8/28-Friday 9/1 at Maple Avenue (Brower Fields), 9:00-11:00am. 
Modified 7/8: Monday 8/28-Friday 9/1 at Maple Avenue (Brower Fields), 9:00-11:00am. 

GIRLS SWIMMING & DIVING

We practice at Skidmore.

  •    Monday 8/21  3:15-5:15pm
  •    Tuesday 8/22  5:45-7:45AM
  •    Wednesday 8/23  5:45-7:45AM

GIRLS TENNIS

Varsity:  Monday 8/21-Wednesday 8/23:  7:30-9:00 a.m.

JV:  Monday 8/21-Wednesday 8/23:  9 – 10:30 a.m.

GIRLS VOLLEYBALL

Varsity, JV & Freshmen: Monday 8/21 – Friday 8/25 7:45-10:30am in HS Blue Gym
Modified: Monday 8/28 – Friday 9/1 3:00-5:00pm at Maple Ave.

GIRLS XC

Monday, August 21st through Friday, August 25th 10am  Spa State Park in front of the Little Theatre
